result.title: runtme error
result.content:
running in linux,but when submission in GNU C 4,showing :Runtime error: exit code is -1073741819.

Here is my code

==================

include<stdio.h>

include<stdlib.h>

include<string.h>

struct link_list{ char *a; int count; struct link_list *next; struct link_list *pre; }node[26],*p,*q,*e; int main(){ int n,i; scanf("%d",&n); char s[n][50]; int d[n]; p=node; for(i=0;i<n;i++){

scanf("%s",s[i]);  

   q=p+(s[i][0]-'a');
   int flag=0;
   while(q->next!=NULL){
          q=q->next;
          if(strcmp(s[i],q->a)==0) {flag=1;(q->count)++;d[i]=q->count;break;}
   }
   if(flag!=1){
        q->next=malloc(sizeof(struct link_list));
        q->next->pre=q;
        q->next->a=malloc(strlen(s[i])*1);
        strcpy(q->next->a,s[i]);
        *((q->next->a)+strlen(s[i]))='\0';
        d[i]=q->count;
   }

} for(i=0;i<n;i++){ if(d[i]==0) printf("%s\n","OK"); else printf("%s%d\n",s[i],d[i]); } return 0; }
